name: You cry but no one responds
name_original: You cry but no one responds
description:
A short text adventure.

========================================

- Controls by mouse  left click.

- ESC to go back to title screen or quit.

- F4 to toggle fullscreen.

========================================

A KNOWN BUG: sometimes game stops reacting to inputs when fighting multiple enemies. I'm looking into it. Try restarting (double ESC).
